Title: Requires the court in proceedings in which an order of protection has been issued and a child is the protected party to notify such child's school of such order of protection
Summary: Requires the court in proceedings in which an order of protection or temporary order of protection has been issued and a child is the protected party to notify such child's school of such order of protection or temporary order or protection on the same day of the issuance of such order of protection or temporary order or protection.
LawCode: Amd §842, Fam Ct Act; amd §530.12, CP L; amd §§2-d & 3210, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, the criminal procedure law and the education law, in relation to notifying school districts of orders of protection and temporary orders of protection
